EmailTemplate.name: J-One Availability.J-One Availability (NH Customers)
EmailTemplate.subject: Client Announcement: J-ONE Functionality Available in Version 6.1.12
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Client Announcement:
J-ONE Functionality Available in Perform Version 6.1.12
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Client}},
TriTech is pleased to announce Version 6.1.12 of the Perform software now has J-ONE functionality available to all New Hampshire departments.
J-ONE will allow you to electronically send complaint information for arrests to the court system. Departments participating in the J-ONE program will have all court disposition information automatically update for the arrests they submitted to J-ONE.
The J-ONE program will allow you to also issue eCitations. Printers are available from the state for use with the J-ONE eCitation program.
Leo Hisoire
Senior Product Manager
TriTech Software Systems | www.tritech.com <http://direct.tritech.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPW9ydGl2dXNuYUJldGFjdXN0LS0tLTUwMTMtcHJvZC02MDAyJm1lc3NhZ2VpZD0wJmRhdGFiYXNlaWQ9NjAwMiZzZXJpYWw9MTMwMDA2MzgwNyZlbWFpbGlkPUpFTk5ZLkNMQVZFUk9AVFJJVEVDSC5DT00mdXNlcmlkPTAmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.tritech.com?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRow5%2FmYJoDpwmWGd5mht7VzDtPj1OY6hB0uI7%2BJK1TtuMFUGpsqOOaMFQsGBoNvwQ%3D%3D> Resources Ready to move forward with J-ONE and Version 6.1.12? For information on how to participate in J-ONE program, please contact J-ONE Program Manager Keith Lohmann at (603) 223-3389 or email keith.lohmann@dos.nh.gov <mailto:keith.lohmann@dos.nh.gov>.
For information on obtaining printers for eCitation, please contact the New Hampshire Highway Safety Agency at (603) 271-2131 or email hwysafety@nhhsa.nh.us <mailto:hwysafety@nhhsa.nh.us>.
To download the latest version of the Perform software please login to your Customer Service Center (portal) at www.tritech.com <http://www.tritech.com>. For software update questions you may contact TriTech Technical Support at 800-987-0911 (option #4) or email performsupport@tritech.com <mailto:performsupport@tritech.com>.
